job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in IT, Computer Science, Business Administration, or related field

jd: From: Sam, Vyze1 inc slenka@vyzeinc.com Reply to: slenka@vyzeinc.com Job Title : ServiceNow Project Manager Work Mode : hybrid ( This position requires 2 days/week on-site as directed by the client. )Location : Sacramento, California Work Auth. : ONLY USC , GC Mode OF Interview : Skype Client : The client is a State of California AgencyResponsibilities include:• Lead and manage ServiceNow projects from initiation to completion, ensuring all objectives are met within budget and on schedule• Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, analysts, and client stakeholders, to define project scope, goals, deliverables, and timelines• Develop and maintain project plans, resource scheduling, budget tracking, and risk management strategies• Communicate effectively with clients to understand their requirements and expectations, and provide timely updates on project progress• Ensure project quality and compliance with ServiceNow best practices and standards• Identify and resolve project issues and risks, and escalate as needed to ensure project success• Conduct project post-mortems and identify areas for improvement for future projectsRequirements:• Bachelor's degree in IT, Computer Science, Business Administration, or related field• Minimum 4 years of experience in IT project management, specifically with ServiceNow projects• ServiceNow certification(s) preferred• Strong leadership, communication, and problem-solving skills• Proven ability to manage multiple projects concurrently and meet deadlines• Experience in Agile project management methodologies• Knowledge of ITIL practices and principles If you have consultants meeting the requirements for this position, please carefully read below before you reply and attach their resumes with their availability PLEASE READ-before submitting any of your consultants so we can move forward with your resumes. Any resumes submitted must show that your candidate meets all the position requirements ALWAYS provide your consultants with full name-(What is on their Visa), resume, phone number, Skype address, rate, email address, and location. Without the information requested, we can not move forward. we will do a Skype interview with your consultants, before submitting them. Submit Candidates LinkedIn with Profile Photo Do not call or follow up emails as that will only slow down our ability to respond to you quickly. Once we have received your resumes we will contact you if there is a fit.
